thread.title: CSG Government Solutions Selected to Provide Financial Analysis Consultation for the Delaware Division of Social Services
thread.title_full: CSG Government Solutions Selected to Provide Financial Analysis Consultation for the Delaware Division of Social Services - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: CSG Government Solutions Selected to Provide Financial Analysis Consultation for the Delaware Division of Social Services
text:
CSG Government Solutions, a national leader in government program modernization, today announced it has been selected by the Delaware Department of Health and Social Services, Division of Social Services (DSS) to assist with cost allocation methodology and processes, program funding requirements, and budget development for Division staff and projects, including the Delaware Integrated Eligibility Modernization System (DEMS).
Chicago, Illinois
CSG Government Solutions , a national leader in government program modernization, today announced it has been selected by the Delaware Department of Health and Social Services, Division of Social Services (DSS) to assist with cost allocation methodology and processes, program funding requirements, and budget development for Division staff and projects, including the Delaware Integrated Eligibility Modernization System (DEMS).
“Proper allocation of costs across programs is important to comply with federal financing requirements,” says Deneen Omer, Director of CSG’s Human Services practice. “CSG’s healthcare and human services program expertise will help ensure the State accesses federal funding and effectively manages project expenditures.”
CSG Government Solutions continues to increase its presence across the United States. The company deploys highly experienced teams and innovative methods, knowledge, and tools to help governments modernize complex program enterprises. CSG clients include 42 state governments, the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services, the U.S. Department of Labor, and large municipal governments.
CONTACT:

About CSG Government Solutions:
CSG Government Solutions is a leading government operations consulting firm focused on helping states modernize critical program enterprises. Our highly experienced teams and industry-leading Centers of Excellence help governments leverage innovative technology and processes to meet the challenges of administering complex programs. Founded in 1997, CSG has established itself as a trusted adviser to government agencies across the U.S.
